thread.title: Photos: Black Stars train in Washington ahead of Canada friendly
thread.title_full: Photos: Black Stars train in Washington ahead of Canada friendly

title: Photos: Black Stars train in Washington ahead of Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 09:55 CET Photos: Black Stars train in Washington ahead of Canada friendly - www.allsports.com.gh 
The senior national team of Ghana, the Black Stars have began training for the international friendly game against Canada on Tuesday. 
Black Stars coach Avram Grant who has been troubled with injuries and visa troubles for his Ghana side managed to name an 18-man squad for the friendly as he prepares for the World Cup qualifying games next month. 
See pictures of the players training above. 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh Sports News Follow Us NEVER SAY/DO ANYTHING IN THE DARK;THAT YOU WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO SAY/DO (DEFEND) IN THE OPEN By: FRANK GYAWU-ASANTE
